hey me goin to play tat once i Dl it on friday!
think there is alot of discussion about it in the singapore rpg mailing list


----- Original Message -----
From: Dexter <dexterw@...>
To: <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 21, 2000 4:06 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] [Lineage] Ok who is playing this game?


> Well server was down for so long yesterday, I downloaded this
> game(164meg!!!) to try it out since Stupid Merns and company also playing.
> I only got to choose a server when I go in, so I persume everyone is in
the
> same server? What lvl are u all now and char name? Inside the people not
as
> friend as EQ, tok to them mostly wont reply one :(
> Game is quite good(considering only in beta) but only thing bad is it can
> only walk, cant fun :(]
> Played a knight and was suprised to see "Training dummies" exactly the
same
> as the one in UO! Those type of thingy where newbies go and keep clicking
> to hit the dummies to gain skills in UO remember? But this time this one
> lets U gain xp till lv 4. Took me 10mins to get my knight to lv 4.
> Anyway like to ask...how to cast spells? OR is my lv 4 Elf too young to
> cast any?
> And regarding taming animals, is it whack the animal to near death, then
> feed it? This is whats been told to me. Correct?
>
> Galarion Elf lv 4(deleted)
> Aphrael Elf lv 4
> Arkana Elf lv 3
> Galarion Knight lv 4
>

send
> it to your friends. You'll be suprised how many true friends you have!
